feature_1.description: Ideological convictions and worldviews of characters.
feature_1.reasoning: The beliefs in each film are fundamentally different, with 'Office Space' focusing on personal liberation from corporate life, while 'Raiders of the Lost Ark' emphasizes historical preservation and heroism.

feature_2.reasoning: Motivations in 'Office Space' center around escaping monotony and seeking personal freedom, whereas in 'Raiders of the Lost Ark,' the motivations are adventure and combating evil, leading to minimal overlap.

feature_3.reasoning: While both films depict teamwork and opposition, 'Office Space' focuses on workplace dynamics and rebellion against authority, unlike the adventure-driven cooperative and antagonistic interactions in 'Raiders of the Lost Ark.'

feature_4.reasoning: Character development in 'Office Space' involves personal liberation and defiance against corporate constraints, while in 'Raiders of the Lost Ark,' the focus is on overcoming physical and moral challenges during an adventurous quest.
